text: This is a list of deities in different polytheistic religions, cultures and mythologies of the world. == Lists == * Ancient Egyptian deities * Mesopotamian deities * Ancient Greek deities * Ancient Meitei deities * Ancient Roman deities * Norse deities * Hindu deities ** Hindu gods ** Devi * Japanese deities == Comparison == This list includes Etruscan, Greek, Roman, Norse and Meitei versions of similar gods and goddesses. The table is ordered by the Greek god's name. Versions of gods Greek Version Roman Version Etruscan Version Norse Version Meitei Version Adonis Adonis Atunis Óðr God Of Bar Amphitrite Salacia Leinth Rán Ereima, Thumleima and Ngaleima Aphrodite Venus Turan Freyja Panthoibi Apollo Apollo Aplu Baldur Korouhanba Ares Mars Laran Tyr Marjing Artemis Diana Artume Skadi Thaa Leima Athena Minerva Menrva Snotra, Sága Panthoibi Bia Vis Chloris Flora Demeter Ceres Sif Phouoibi Dionysus Bacchus Fufluns Phou Ningthou Eos Aurora Thesan Eros Cupid geras senectus Hades Pluto Aita Hel Thongalel Harmonia Concordia Hebe Juventas Idunn Hecate Trivia Lainaotabi Hephaestus Vulcan Sethlans Pishatao and Khamlangba Hera Juno Uni Frigga Leimarel Sidabi and Tampha Lairembi Hermes Mercury Turms Hermod Sanamahi Hestia Vesta Emoinu and Yumjao Leima Hypnos Somnus Khuman Apokpa Iris Arcus Nongdol Leima Nemesis Nemesis Nike Victoria Nongpok Leima Pan Faunus Poseidon Neptune Nethuns Njörd Wangbren and Irai Ningthou Persephone Proserpina Ēostre Laikhurembi Selene Luna Lusna Máni Thaleima Tyche Fortuna Nurtia Lan Leima Zeus Jupiter Tinia Odin Salailen == Related pages == * Demigod * Divinity
title: Lists of deities
